name: Fuaulo and the 5 ½ Souls
description:
This is a 2D Adventure RPG, where you'll have to collect 5 pieces (and a half) of all the elemental souls to seal the shadows away! Watch your mind in battles btw...

Build 1.1 - Some places won't have soundtracks and minor graphic glitches can occur, feel free to tell me what i have to fix. Have Fun :)
